name: slingback
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of women's shoes) with a strap around the back of the heel instead of a full covering: slingback sandals/shoes My sister and I got fabulous party dresses and slingback heels. See
slingbacks
More examplesFewer examplesShe went to court in a tight white dress and gold slingback heels. Sylvia was pacing the room, her slingback sandals flapping against her heels with every step.Slingback shoes are a good choice for summer as they can be adjusted during the day.
